sys_script_include.name: GeneratePDFAjax

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d1b9bdc583312e1034af11b6feaad34b
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1755581_demo3.GeneratePDFAjax</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>GeneratePDFAjax</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var GeneratePDFAjax = Class.create();
GeneratePDFAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    generatePDF: function() {
        var itemId = this.getParameter('sysparm_item_id');
        var item = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
        if (item.get(itemId)) {
            // 创建PDF内容
            var pdf = new PDFDocument();
            pdf.setTitle(item.getDisplayValue('name'));
            pdf.addParagraph('Catalog Item: ' + item.getDisplayValue('name'));
            pdf.addParagraph('Description: ' + item.getDisplayValue('description'));
            // 添加更多内容...

            // 生成PDF并返回下载URL
            var attachment = pdf.generate(item.getDisplayValue('name') + '.pdf');
            return attachment.getURL();
        }
        return '';
    },
    type: 'GeneratePDFAjax'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-27 08:06:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>d1b9bdc583312e1034af11b6feaad34b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GeneratePDFAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Demo3" source="x_1755581_demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Demo3">5c43e94983bdea1034af11b6feaad324</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d1b9bdc583312e1034af11b6feaad34b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-27 08:06:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
